trans-unit.source: Encapsulates the encryption algorithm used for XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Encapsula o algoritmo de encriptação utilizado para encriptação de XML.

trans-unit.source: The `<EncryptionMethod>` tag uses a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) to identify the encryption algorithm that must be used to decrypt XML data.
trans-unit.target: O `<EncryptionMethod>` tag utiliza um Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) para identificar o algoritmo de encriptação que tem de ser utilizado para desencriptar os dados XML.

trans-unit.source: The EncryptionMethod class encapsulates the `<EncryptionMethod>` tag defined by the World Wide Web Consortium XML Encryption specification located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
trans-unit.target: A classe de EncryptionMethod encapsula o `<EncryptionMethod>` tag definido pela especificação World Wide Web Consortium XML encriptação localizado em http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.

trans-unit.source: Use the EncryptionMethod class to identify the encryption algorithm associated with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> element or the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> element.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a classe de EncryptionMethod para identificar o algoritmo de encriptação associado a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>elemento ou <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>elemento.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>

trans-unit.source: Use one of the URI identifiers defined by the World Wide Web Consortium XML Encryption specification located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
trans-unit.target: Utilize um dos identificadores URI definidos pela especificação World Wide Web Consortium XML encriptação localizada em http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.

trans-unit.source: All URI identifiers are accessible as static fields of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml> class.
trans-unit.target: Todos os identificadores URI estão acessíveis como campos estáticos de que a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml>classe.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod> class without specifying the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of an encryption algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor inicializa uma nova instância do <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod>classe sem especificar o Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) de um algoritmo de encriptação.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod"></xref> class specifying an algorithm Uniform Resource Identifier (URI).
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod"> </xref> classe especificando um algoritmo Uniform Resource Identifier (URI).

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod> class using the URI of an encryption algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor inicializa uma nova instância do <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod>classe utilizando o URI de um algoritmo de encriptação.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod>

trans-unit.source: Use one of the URI identifiers defined by the World Wide Web Consortium XML Encryption specification located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
trans-unit.target: Utilize um dos identificadores URI definidos pela especificação World Wide Web Consortium XML encriptação localizada em http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.

trans-unit.source: All URI identifiers are accessible as static fields of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml> class.
trans-unit.target: Todos os identificadores URI estão acessíveis como campos estáticos de que a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml>classe.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml>

trans-unit.source: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the algorithm represented by an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: O Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) que descreve o algoritmo representado por uma instância do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> object that encapsulates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"> </xref> objecto que encapsula uma instância do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The GetXml method returns a representation of the `<EncryptionMethod>` element.
trans-unit.target: O método GetXml devolve uma representação do `<EncryptionMethod>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> object that encapsulates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"> </xref> objecto que encapsula uma instância do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the algorithm to use for XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) que descreve o algoritmo a utilizar para a encriptação de XML.

trans-unit.source: The KeyAlgorithm property describes the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the encryption algorithm used to encrypt data associated with either the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> element or the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> element.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade KeyAlgorithm descreve o Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) do algoritmo de encriptação utilizado para encriptar dados associados a um o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>elemento ou <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>elemento.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>

trans-unit.source: Use one of the URI identifiers defined by the World Wide Web Consortium XML Encryption specification located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
trans-unit.target: Utilize um dos identificadores URI definidos pela especificação World Wide Web Consortium XML encriptação localizada em http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.

trans-unit.source: All URI identifiers are accessible as static fields of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml> class.
trans-unit.target: Todos os identificadores URI estão acessíveis como campos estáticos de que a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml>classe.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml>

trans-unit.source: A Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the algorithm to use for XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Um Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) que descreve o algoritmo a utilizar para a encriptação de XML.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the algorithm key size used for XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tamanho da chave de algoritmo utilizado para encriptação de XML.

trans-unit.source: The KeySize property describes the key size of the encryption algorithm used to encrypt data associated with either the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> element or the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> element.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de KeySize descreve o tamanho da chave do algoritmo de encriptação utilizado para encriptar dados associados a um o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>elemento ou <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>elemento.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>

trans-unit.source: The algorithm key size, in bits, used for XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo tamanho da chave, em bits, utilizada para encriptação de XML.

trans-unit.source: The KeySize property was set to a value that was less than 0.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de KeySize foi definida como um valor que foi inferior a 0.

trans-unit.source: Parses the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> object and configures the internal state of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod"></xref> object to match.
trans-unit.target: Analisa especificado <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"> </xref> de objeto e configura o estado interno do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod"> </xref> objeto para corresponder.

trans-unit.source: The LoadXml method configures the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod> object to match the state of an <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> object.
trans-unit.target: O método LoadXml configura o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod>objeto para fazer corresponder o estado de um <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>objeto.</xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> object to parse.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"> </xref> objeto analisar.

trans-unit.source: The value parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The value parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The key size expressed in the value parameter was less than 0.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho da chave expresso no value parâmetro era inferior a 0.
